page.title: 15Law and Order in S.Bradford.
page.content: The 'block'is in two police districts, {Odsal and Laisterdyke.}Laisterdyke serves most of the block,covering Tyersal,Holme Wood,Bierley and Bowling.The estates to the South of the Ring Road and the West of the M606 come in the Odsal district.{Community {constables,}who aim to get to know a locality and it's population,are the police most in contact with the general public.There are{11 community {constables}in our 'block'.Out of 134 police officers in the Laisterdyke section there are 18 female officers. The section has it's own CID,Road Traffic and Dog handling sections.The most{common crimes}in the area are house{burglary and vehicle thefts. Burglary has gone up dramatically in recent years.Last year there were 6,000 reported crimes,of all kinds, in our 'block'.
